title: how do you kite as adc?
body:
recently i saw a {{champion:51}}  player moving and attacking at the same time.how does the player does that.
what sort of keybindings is used?

replies.body:
Click back (right click), then a press 'A' key and click champ / creeps.

The best way (that I learnt to kit) is to start kiting creeps, so like jungle camps - hit and walk back whilst still hitting them.
But it's up to you.

Called "A moving" or "orb walking".

You can look at videos that teach you how to do it. Its pretty easy just requires practice.
The default keybind is "A" or "V".

I personally rebound mine to a mouse button for easier use.

Not 100% sure if this is legit but what I consider "kiting" is using the A key to attack and the right mouse button to move simultaneously, I have never actually looked it up so it's merely an assumption but I'm pretty sure I'm right.
